chapters.title: Introduction to Ganga
chapters.description: Introduce Ganga as the divine river, revered in Indian mythology for her purity and spiritual significance.

chapters.title: The Descent to Earth
chapters.description: Narrate the story of how Ganga descended to Earth, a decision filled with compassion and responsibility.

chapters.title: Her Sacrificial Role
chapters.description: Highlight the sacrifices Ganga made as she cleanses and nurtures life on Earth, enduring pollution and exploitation.

chapters.title: Reflection on Gratitude
chapters.description: Conclude with a call to appreciate and protect Ganga, honoring her sacrifices with our actions.
